page.title: 09THE SCHOOL BUILDING
page.content: The present Greenloaning School building was built in 1927,before that it was in a small building which is now a cottage.It is a stone building which is painted white with black round the windows.There are 3 rooms in the school. Two classrooms,with a sliding partition between,which is opened for the Christmas party,prize giving and end of term concerts.The other room is the dining room but it is also used for music,P.E. and the service with the school Chaplain every other Friday. When it is used for P.E. all the tables & chairs need to be moved out to the edge of the room. There is also a staffroom,staff toilet and the cleaners room where the brushes,vacuum cleaner,polisher and cleaning materials are kept.There are 2 covered play sheds for wet weather, at the end of each are the toilets.
